efff4d36-0698-46ae-b840-eb6430ae8693: A creature targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is held immobile by glowing golden chains composed of pure sunlight. For a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, the creature is {g|ConditionParalyzed}paralyzed{/g}, held in place, and is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus 1 damage per caster level every round. It may attempt a new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} each round to end the effect. If the initial saving throw is successful, the target is {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for one round and is dealt the same amount of damage.
eb248c1d-97f4-48b2-a488-74a5577077b0: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to diseases for 10 minutes.
3ec83115-006e-4551-82d8-d5a445032a68: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g}, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
feab15b2-cf2e-46b7-9a1f-40ac2834fda1: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.
428f6aaa-70e3-47a2-b155-eb7255da79b6: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
3ab98bcc-c0bc-4c49-b87f-8e18d7a61201: All allies in a 30-foot radius gain the combined effect of {g|SpellsAvengersBlessing}Avenger's Blessing{/g}, {g|SpellsMindBlank}Mind Blank{/g} and {g|SpellsHolySword}Holy Sword{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for one hour.
ec8d8277-5ef6-43de-bef6-593a9048c560: All allies in a 30-foot radius receive {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/-. Angel can activate his Sword of Heaven ability one more time per day.
dae46889-0d72-4c54-9b4a-7fddc3f492ce: All demons in a 40-foot radius around the caster make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If it's failed, the demon is dealt 10 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. If the saving throw is successful, the demon is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} damage per caster level.
782e310f-17f8-4a0a-b07a-a8aa36951d80:
Angel's Halo now emanates an aura similar to the effect of {g|SpellsHolyAura}holy aura{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
A brilliant divine radiance surrounds the subjects, protecting them from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, granting them {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}resistance to spells{/g} cast by {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} creatures, and causing evil creatures to become {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g} when they strike the subjects. This abjuration has four effects.
First, each warded creature gains a +4 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +4 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Unlike {g|SpellsProtectionFromEvil}protection from evil{/g}, this benefit applies against all attacks, not just against attacks by evil creatures.
Second, each warded creature gains spell resistance 20 + Angel's mythic rank against evil spells and spells cast by evil creatures.
Third, the abjuration protects from all mind-affecting spells and effects.
Finally, if an evil creature succeeds on a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} against a creature warded by a holy aura, the offending attacker is blinded (Fortitude save negates, as {g|SpellsBlindness}blindness{/g}, but against holy aura's save ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier)).
ec92b1d0-9367-47e9-8b46-48fe980e3694:
At 3rd rank, Angel receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. He can either choose to take it as part of an existing full divine spellcaster spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
Standalone spellbook has an independent progression and spell slots. The number of its spell slots can't be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
In case of merging spellbooks the maximum {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of the spells within it is 30, and you can use spell slots from the original spellbook to cast mythic spells. Raising the caster level makes spells more powerful. The number of spell slots can be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic feat. Spontaneous spellcasters get the new known spells from their original class and from mythic path independently: the original class's progression doesn't change, and every mythic rank increase gives additional known spells.
If you are multiclassing, it is recommended to use the standalone spellbook.
c9ceb485-9bfa-44f7-abe4-4cf80d924134: At 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th mythic ranks, an Angel can select an improvement to the Sword of Heaven ability. Improvements that are available at 8th and 10th ranks are significantly more powerful.
ec93f43f-6fdf-46f4-b952-8d68be2295b9: At 5th, 7th, and 9th mythic rank, an Angel can select an improvement to the Angelic Halo ability.
2f002230-7442-40cc-bb8f-56042b1dcc7d: Every enemy in a 30-foot radius is dealt 12 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Half of this damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, half is holy damage. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} reduces the amount to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d12{/g} damage per caster level.
5679b356-45d3-4b54-a4c3-446900273839: Every enemy in the radius of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Allies are dealt 1 holy damage per caster level, but are automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} from any {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability score damage{/g}, {g|ConditionBlind}blindness{/g}, {g|ConditionConfusion}confusion{/g}, and {g|ConditionDazzled}dazzled{/g}, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions. Additionally, it tries to dispel all diseases, poisons and curses from the allies.
39888846-bca4-47de-b880-c1afd632a518: For one minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, any time the target is hit by a demon, the demon is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus 1 damage per two caster levels. Additionally, the target gains deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to 2 plus 1 per six caster levels.
ed0842c8-6325-443a-819c-935b3ac525ae: For one minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal addition {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per four caster levels, and any creature striking the target in melee deals normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, but also takes 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point per caster level.
ead5ebc6-27b4-4995-951a-48ca4187a4b9: For the next number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, you become incorporeal and gain the ability to shoot rays of holy fire as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per caster level, half of which is fire and half is holy.
35b8f8c9-01fe-4b90-8a98-61f2b53e77ea: For the next one minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, if the target would be brought below zero {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, it is instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} to maximum and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per caster level to all enemies in a 20-foot radius.
a991045c-fd32-4751-aa19-d6329a7e058d: Mythic Angel gains a celestial halo. Each ally within 50 feet of the Angel gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half Angel's mythic rank plus 1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} creatures.
9913a5c2-4e87-457b-9b78-9aec17fa7a00:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Good gain an ability to unleash a ray of heavenly light, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This ray {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} allies for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} or deals the same amount of damage to enemies. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to angels, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
284d41ac-5806-406d-abe8-f82b0ca76279: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Good become closer to angels, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
5b47dffc-d55b-4079-9b2c-92ec89fbdb38: The Angel is a mighty champion of good who sets a shining example for the crusaders, smiting demons with a sword of holy flame. Those who fight alongside the Angel can be certain that they will be protected, healed, and even resurrected in the event of their untimely demise.
6958552d-39db-4d1e-8bb5-466f46f6654e: The owner of the imbued weapon now is under effect similar to {g|SpellsHaste}Haste{/g}, but granting 2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and making all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of level 7 or lower quickened, as though using the {g|FeatureQuickenSpell}Quicken Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
d5fb8e7a-5d6a-47bd-ad33-c460bf95c25f: The target gains immunity to diseases for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
26b10a1b-fc50-43ff-b00a-f95a108c8ac3: The target gains immunity to {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g}, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
cded7d55-9228-4a26-8a2a-6b420baf8236: The target gains immunity to {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases and poisons for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
d4de13c2-68c0-4a11-b1de-cce0bcd1ce72: The target gains immunity to {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
0b991748-16e9-42dd-8593-a88072af1898: The target suffers a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
7f4318c4-90c1-43f9-8cb5-9086ad983d6f: The target suffers a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
0b4e815d-eed9-421f-9be6-db478e582817: This ability summons a Movanic Deva for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
b525c859-374a-4add-ba40-2a43a1c3b112: This ability summons a Spirit Guardian for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
b42121dc-bca4-42de-b030-83d71d7319cb: This ability summons a Spirit Paladin for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
9b3649ed-5f5a-4a1c-a460-06070bbee3d9: This ability summons a pair of Astral Devas for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
6dd33ede-d6ae-4f2d-9c14-9eb8a8c4b18f: This ability summons a pair of Movanic Devas for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
3145c796-bd06-4df8-9e65-1d9c140a536e: This ability summons a pair of Spirit Paladins for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
7b218a3e-4457-446a-b414-4c2f1124201b: This ability summons an Astral Deva for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
7a455bb8-1d59-45c1-8b64-78e692522892: This ability summons four Astral Devas for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
ee55c39b-0262-4ad6-9d00-a99e9f088166: This ability summons three Spirit Guardians for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
13b92c1e-d94f-40e0-b982-7706e618b267: This blessing targets one ally in close range. The ally is granted the combined effect of {g|SpellsShield}Shield{/g}, {g|SpellsShieldOfFaith}Shield of Faith{/g}, {g|SpellsProtectionFromArrows}Protection From Arrows{/g}, {g|SpellsDisplacement}Displacement{/g} and {g|SpellsResistEnergy}Resist Fire{/g}, Cold, Electricity, Acid and Sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for one minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
6a7415d6-e9c8-40c2-bb47-7a2b64ec9fdb: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Target}spell targets{/g} an ally in close range. The target gains the combined effect of {g|SpellsDivinePower}Divine Power{/g}, {g|SpellsHolyAura}Holy Aura{/g} and {g|SpellsGreaterHeroism}Greater Heroism{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
f761c2c4-b17e-46c2-b347-c20eb1d97170: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} affects all undead creatures, {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} outsiders and divine casters devoted to evil deities. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it's {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. If the saving throw is successful, the target is {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} for one round. This spell ignores immunity to fear effects.
8676adc0-9165-4434-a6a1-83cdb2d7fbcb: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like bolt of justice, except it affects multiple creatures.
8bb5fe41-7f10-4217-adb4-defd8d9cd637:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} restores 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
Unlike other spells that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, bring back can bring recently slain creatures back to life. If cast upon a creature that has died within 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, apply the healing from this spell to the creature. If the healed creature's hit point total is at a negative amount less than its {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score, it comes back to life and stabilizes at its new hit point total. If the creature's hit point total is at a negative amount equal to or greater than its Constitution score, the creature remains dead. Creatures brought back to life with this spell gain a temporary negative level that lasts for 1 day.
3739a25a-d2b6-48ce-a3e5-3f18205853c2: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} works as Aegis of the Faithful, but affects all allies in a 20-foot radius and lasts for 1 hour.
88721633-0742-44cb-9f84-626030fd4e30: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} works as {g|SpellsBreathOfLife}Breath of Life{/g}, but affects all allies in a 20-foot radius.
1511df2e-6322-4255-9cda-b7b4d7fb28be: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} works as {g|SpellsResurrection}Resurrection{/g}, but affects every ally in a 30-foot radius around the caster.
589f1ccb-58ba-44bb-b8a8-a7f845aad3c6: Weapons of an angel become the bane to all demons. You gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made against creatures with Demon subtype, and successful hits deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}. This bonus stacks with Bane special quality.
5e7b9ff9-28da-43f9-ad59-b8f2d4d88483: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all allies in the 50-foot area get a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to fire, cold, acid and electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g} equal to 5 per Angel's mythic rank, and a bonus to sonic and negative energy resistance equal to 3 per Angel's mythic rank, as well as a bonus to force, unholy, holy and divine resistance equal to Angel's mythic rank.
3c60f3eb-475f-4f85-b290-4095d6e54e70: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all demons and undead creatures in the 50-foot area suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + mythic rank) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
886fda7b-4998-4f8f-be25-5c954e3acc9b: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all enemies in a 50-foot area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 1 + half the Angel's mythic rank, as well as a penalty to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to the half the penalty to spell resistance.
c1295e7c-1348-4582-88d5-284e28ae1a72: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, an enemy that {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} the Angel first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) or be {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 round. On a successful saving throw, the enemy becomes dazzled for 1 minute.
13b2678e-cc40-4306-b7a7-a3cce952669f: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, the Angel doesn't suffer any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the allies' {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} that have an area of effect. If Angel is the main target of such a spell, it becomes empowered, as though using the {g|FeatureEmpoweredSpell}Empower Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against it is increased by 2.
15c3600d-4258-4bde-b93d-cd7cf06ffeca: Whenever Sword of Heaven is active, this ability allows the Angel to transform all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the Angel into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
541bf09a-cb51-4350-a4c3-6ff4a707a4c7: Whenever the angel activates the Sword of Heaven ability, it restores him 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and removes the following negative conditions: {g|ConditionBlind}blind{/g}, {g|ConditionConfusion}confused{/g}, {g|ConditionDaze}dazed{/g}, {g|ConditionDazzled}dazzled{/g}, diseased, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g}, poisoned, {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}, {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g}. It also dispels the effects of the {g|SpellsFeeblemind}feeblemind{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and ecorche's Seize Skin ability.
b164b811-2e7c-41c7-bcd9-302defcde6e4: While Angelic Halo is active, whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} equal to Angel's mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
fd343e99-0f61-42d9-a142-199d1383626c: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies. You and each of your allies gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, while each of your foes takes a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on such {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
1edc58b8-63fe-4303-b777-8dbe84163476: You can grant the benefits of your Sword of Heaven ability to all allies in a 50-foot radius.
5ffcc41e-1282-468b-8e98-25d39fe648fa: You create a 30-foot radius area for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Each round every creature in the area is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per two caster levels.
9c281cd1-9a22-40c0-9751-553bc74f670f: You create a 60-foot long line of holy energy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} to all targets on the line.
024a8a45-4d33-45a3-a60e-cbb956ecd4c8: You create a wall of light, which deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} creature going through it. It grants any good or neutral creature an ability to deal 2d6 additional holy damage with their next {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If a good or neutral creature charges through the wall, it instead deals 1d6 holy damage per caster level with their next attack.
581396aa-63f4-4942-8ed1-1db605bac63c: You gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
dfe4738b-9048-4c25-be68-d25db3f3e25f: You make a {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against any undead creature. If it fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it is immediately destroyed. If the target succeeds, it is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus 1 damage per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
8ee20403-2d44-4aeb-ae48-dadd53ef6774:
You release a powerful stroke of energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. The target needs to make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}, or become {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.
If the target is {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} instead deals 1d8 points of holy damage per caster level. The target needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone and suffer a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and saving throws.
If the target is an evil outsider or an undead creature, the spell instead deals 1d10 points of holy damage per caster level. The target needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone and suffer a -4 penalty to AC, attack rolls and saving throws.
If the target is a demon lord, an evil dragon or a lord of undead (a powerful undead creature like liches, undead dragons, nightshades and similar), the spell instead deals 1d12 points of holy damage per caster level. The target suffers a -4 penalty to AC, attack rolls and saving throws. It also needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone.
9d2a7a29-911e-4bdd-80ba-ddf4f7682f57: You shoot a ray of holy fire as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, half of which is fire and half is holy.
0deb16e6-f101-4944-8b2c-e01e6934b1ba: You summon a soothing light, warming the hearts of your allies and obscuring the vision of your enemies. Every ally in 20ft radius gets 1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} for 1 hour, and the enemies become dazzled for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
11b4ee7d-ad55-4665-9c6a-e6b62fa070c2: You {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} yourself for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and automatically dispel any negative effects on yourself.
4bc34e3b-6ca1-4fdd-8dcd-15429d0b40a8: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} of the owner of the imbued weapon now additionally deal weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all enemies within 5 feet.
